import requests
import json
import pandas as pd

url = "https://api.spacexdata.com/v3/launches"
headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json"}

response = requests.get(url)
data = response.json()

df_pandas = pd.json_normalize(
				data,  # your list of dicts\n",
				meta=[
				    'flight_number',
				    'mission_name',
					'launch_year',
					'launch_date_utc',
					'launch_success',
					['rocket', 'rocket_id'],
					['rocket', 'rocket_name'],
					['rocket', 'rocket_type'],
					['launch_site', 'site_name'],
					['launch_failure_details', 'reason']
					],
					record_path=['rocket', 'second_stage', 'payloads'],  # nested array to flatten\n",
					errors='ignore'
				)

from pyspark.sql.types import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

df = spark.read.load('abfss://spacexfs@group2dls.dfs.core.windows.net/spacex_launches_v4',
    format='json')
df2 = spark.read.load('abfss://spacexfs@group2dls.dfs.core.windows.net/spacex_payloads_v4',
    format='json')
display(df.limit(10))
display(df2.limit(10))
